title: Campanario (Port and Pier)
body:
On the coast of this name, there is a small and poor port, where an insignificant pier was built in 1909.

It is also known by the name of Porto da Lapa. It is 3 miles away from the port of Camara de Lôbos and 1.7 miles from Ribeira Brava.

Campanario: Parish with a small and poor port, also known by the name of Porto da Lapa

1909: Construction of an insignificant pier on the coast of the Campanario parish
